Experience.title: Technologies and tools that I use in development

Projects.title: Experience in development and projects in which I participated

Main.about: I am a leading developer with 4 years of experience in web development, specializing in architecture, optimization and creation of scalable solutions. He worked on large corporate and international projects, made key technical decisions, improved the code base and developed development processes. I pay special attention to code quality, refactoring, and uniform standards to speed up the team's work and improve product reliability.

lead.title: Lead Developer
lead.text: Made key architectural decisions and developed scalable architecture.

mentorship.title: Mentorship
mentorship.text: Helped colleagues understand code and explained complex concepts.

review.title: Cross-Review
review.text: Improved code quality and suggested optimizations.

refactoring.title: Refactoring & Code Style
refactoring.text: Enhanced code structure, implemented standards, and streamlined the codebase.
